oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parole for Capt. D. D. Brisendine, Co. C, 10th Tenn. Cav.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Paroled at Paducah, Ky., this parole was signed by order of Brig. Gen. S. Meredith and gives a physical description of Brisendine. Records show Brisendine serving alternately in Co. I and R of Col. William Demoss' 10th Tenn. Cav. Regt. CSA. His name is misspelled "Bricendine" in the document.
